page.title: 17Life Styles in Stock
page.content: The Bakers Arms was once a pupil house converted from a cottage in the 16th century.It was only a beer house not allowed to sell wines or spirits. It was called the Jolly Miller after the 3 mills behind it on the common. The Bear has two big linking chimneys with a smoke chamber at the junction. There is a story about Spider,a drunken potman who used to climb up the chimney in one bar and down the other for a pint.One day he never came down and it is said his corpse was found in the smoke chamber many years later when renovation work being done.
